summary: This small utility will convert any mp3 or wav file to xwm for use in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This small utility will convert any mp3 or wav file to xwm for use in Skyrim.

[b]Requirements[/b]
To use this utility you must have the .NET framework 3.0 installed.
Two more files must be downloaded and placed at the same folder with the xwmConvert.exe:
- ffmpeg.exe
- xWMAEncode.exe
as I cannot provide you these files, you must get them elsewhere.
The ffmpeg can be downloaded from [url=http://ffmpeg.zeranoe.com/builds/]http://ffmpeg.zeranoe.com/builds/[/url], and the xWMAEncode.exe can be found as part of the DirectX SDK.

[b]How to use[/b]
Drag and drop the file of choice (currently supports only mp3 and wav) into the app window,
The app will do it\'s magic and eventually spit out a xwm file.
[s]Currently supports only one file at a time, but hopefully I\'ll add the option to drag n drop multiple files at once.[/s]

[b]The magic behind it[/b]
It uses two small command-line utilities to convert the files to xwm.
[url=http://ffmpeg.zeranoe.com/builds/]ffmpeg.exe[/url] - To convert mp3 to wav, as the the xwma encoder accept only wav files
[url=http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/query/ee415832]xWMAEncode.exe[/url] - Converts the wav file to xwma (xwm) format 

[b]Change log[/b]
version 1.0.0.3:
-Updated to support dragging in multiple files at once (no matter which file type they are, be it mp3, wav or xwm)

version 1.0.0.2:
-Added xwm to wav convertion support

version 1.0.0.1:
-Initial release
